official_title: Recognizing the 140th anniversary of the founding of the Brotherhood of Locomotive Engineers, and congratulating the members and officers of the Brotherhood of Locomotive Engineers for the union's many achievements.

summary.text: Recognize the 140th anniversary of the founding of the Brotherhood of Locomotive Engineers and its contributions to the structural development and building of the United States.

titles.title: Recognizing the 140th anniversary of the founding of the Brotherhood of Locomotive Engineers, and congratulating the members and officers of the Brotherhood of Locomotive Engineers for the union's many achievements.
